thread.title: 28 Ways to Look Your Best This February
thread.title_full: 28 Ways to Look Your Best This February

title: 28 Ways to Look Your Best This February
text: 28 Ways to Look Your Best This February X Full screen 28 Ways to Look Your Best This February Punxsutawney Phil (the weather predicting groundhog) may see six more weeks of winter in our future but whether warm weather comes tomorrow of in two months, you still have to be ready for every daily sartorial challengeâ€”no matter where you live. So while you may not be able to plan your outfits weeks in advance, you can still have a strategy. We know you're probably tired of hearing the word "layering", but the skill's importance hasn't changed. If you're going to triumph over skittish weather, high winds, and surprise precipitation you'll need a closet full of wear-with-anything basics, comfortable tailoring, leading man outerwear, and attention-grabbing accessories. Luckily, we've got your back. Here are twenty-eight days of style inspiration guaranteed to make each day a little better. Swipe to see the photos Read More
